org.jisonami.crypto

类 AbstractNonSymmetricCryptography

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jisonami.crypto.AbstractCryptography
      • org.jisonami.crypto.AbstractNonSymmetricCryptography
  • 直接已知子类:
    KeyAgreementCryptography, NonSymmetricCryptography

    public abstract class AbstractNonSymmetricCryptography
extends AbstractCryptography

    Created by jisonami on 2016/10/21.

    非对称密码抽象类，包含密钥对生成，公钥和私钥还原等操作

    用于支持非对称密钥算法和密钥协商算法的非对称密钥处理部分

    从以下版本开始:
    0.0.1
    作者:
    jisonami
    另请参阅:
    AbstractCryptography, NonSymmetricCryptography, KeyAgreementCryptography
